data.comment: The big names in today's match at Adams Park have now been confirmed.
The match has started at Adams Park.
In the minute 45, John Brooks blows to end the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Ismaila Sarr scores with a header and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 52, Great play from Kiko Femenia to set up the goal.
Anthony Stewart equalizes with a header to make it 1-1.
Joe Jacobson instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 74, Domingos Quina, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Glenn Murray is the substitute for Watford.
Nathaniel Chalobah is on a sub for Christian Kabasele for Watford.
Watford's Kiko Femenia has been booked in Wycombe.
In the minute 85, Uche Ikpeazu is replacing Adebayo Akinfenwa for Wycombe at Adams Park.
Wycombe make their second substitution with Fred Onyedinma replacing Daryl Horgan.
The home team have replaced Scott Kashket with Alex Samuel. This is the third substitution made today by Gareth Ainsworth.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
Vladan Ivic is making the team's third substitution at Adams Park with James Garner replacing Tom Cleverley.
